name: The Daily Grind
description:
We’ve made a game! The Daily Grind is all about running the trendiest cafe, and keeping up with orders!

Using your Left Mouse button, grab and create the correct drinks for your customers before they get impatient and leave! Be careful though, for too many incorrect orders may leave you with a bad review.

Programmers: Aaron Smit (@AaronDSmit) & Daniel Studdert (@danstuddert

Art: Mario Barone @mariobaronedev

Design: Daniel Studdert & Mario Barone

Special Thanks to:

-Emily White (2D) @Fabula_Nix -Zane Talbot (3D) @zanertalbot

Downloadable:

https://drive.google.com/open?id=1Zot-6IVMvPoHY_RiExEAmHTv-awV2KLY
